column5: If they somehow manage to get it there they will have to keep an eye on it or it'll end up in Putin's man cave.
Well that's outrageously stupid...makes me hate Budweiser even more  Maybe if the beer was even remotely Canadian...

Well that's outrageously stupid...makes me hate Budweiser even more  Maybe if the beer was even remotely Canadian... Maybe if was even real beer!!! The original Czech version of Bud is now being sold in Canada under the name "Czechvar', Couldn't use the Bud name now that the Americans have ruined it!!
Cool idea but nobody will see it up there...plus the beer will likely be slushy up there

If it was truly Canadian, there would be a Tim Horton's underneath it. HH
